name: A Tiny Chance
description:
As the world turned more and more inhospitable with every passing day, Dr. Octavius Adams knew something needed to be done. The levels of heat, pollution and radiation reached such heights that mammals of all shapes and sizes, including humans, were simply becoming inadequate for life on Earth. That’s where the bears came in, the water bears - Tardigrades.

In these little critters Dr. Adams found everything humans once had but tragically lost - resilience, adaptability, strength and, of course, exquisite beauty. With tardigrades as his muses, the good doctor found himself focusing on their seemingly singular impediment - SIZE.
